original_text: A man might kill an animal that belongs to another man. Then he must give an animal that is alive to the man. You must give a living animal if you take a living animal's life.
korean_text: 짐승을 쳐죽인 자는 짐승으로 짐승을 갚을 것이며

sentences.original_text: A man might kill an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 동물을 죽일 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Then he must give an animal
that is alive to the man
You must give a living animal
if you take a living animal's life
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 살아있는 동물의 목숨을 빼앗으면
